flow.descriptionCdata:
ce74fc03-b4d0-4d77-b2da-814b4470fbc9.12c4bc7c-76ba-4fab-ac21-42c72d8e746d.description=
This operation checks whether a string matches another string, using a specific matching rule. The "toMatch" input is the string that is checked for matching the "matchTo" expression. 

Inputs\:
    matchType - The type of match to perform.
Valid values\: Exact Match, Contains, Contains Once, Does Not Contain, Match All Words, Match No Words, Regex
Default value\: Exact Match
    toMatch - The string that is checked for matching.
    matchTo - The string to match against.
Example\: If "matchType" is “RegEx”, the "matchTo" input is a regular expression such as\: ^-?\d+(([\.,]\d+)?)+$. 
    ignoreCase - Specifies whether to ignore case when matching or not.
Valid values\: False, True
Default value\: False

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the string "Matches" if the "toMatch" string matches the "matchTo" string. Otherwise, it contains the string "Does Not Match".  

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully.
ce74fc03-b4d0-4d77-b2da-814b4470fbc9.1acef2cb-3077-4496-ab15-b53f84842be4.description=This flow with send an email notifying the Support team that the email notification to the creator failed. Input Values\: vm.requester.email - The email address from the prior step result htmldocument - THe email body text from the prior result ce74fc03-b4d0-4d77-b2da-814b4470fbc9.3820d28a-f89f-4d50-a537-fbac08167ffe.description=This flow will format and mount initial and additional datadisks to virtual and physical servers. The inputs are\: server.os Mandatory - should contain 'win' in case of windows, and '2008' or '2012' to make a difference between those two isAdditional Mandatory - should be 'True' if the disk that is added is not the first initial datadisk, but an additional one lun.wwname Only required for additional Linux datadisks disk.filesystem Only required for Linux servers server.hostname Madatory disk.mountpoint Not used at the moment. Can be used later to specifiy a mountpoint. See memo in the flow. disk.size Mandatory for Windows (All servers), and for Linux virtual servers isVirtual Mandatory - should be 'True' if the server is a virtual server. False for physical servers ce74fc03-b4d0-4d77-b2da-814b4470fbc9.48243f07-a492-438d-a3c4-356e9e6a3bff.description=This flow with send an email notifying the Support team that the email notification to the creator failed. Input Values\: vm.requester.email - The email address from the prior step result htmldocument - THe email body text from the prior result ce74fc03-b4d0-4d77-b2da-814b4470fbc9.5b318955-b4e0-4ba9-8dda-48a09d66af75.description=This flow with send an email notifying the Support team that the email notification to the creator failed. flow.name: Dev Create Quorum Disk
